Text:
function EP01_06()
    -- .承-3「姉さんの夢」
    SaveData.Title = "姉さんの夢"

    -- //BG：公園
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG003aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav",0)

    MSG([[ By the time I reached middle school, there wasn’t a single person in town who didn’t know the name "Marika Ikusa." ]])

    MSG([[ Serving as student council president at the local middle school, she also advanced to the national tournaments in every club she joined, and her academic performance topped the school. On top of that, she was so beautiful that talent agencies were constantly courting her. ]])

    MSG([[ Just walking through town, crowds would gather hoping to catch a glimpse of Marika-neesan, her popularity was extraordinary. ]])

    MSG([[ Wanting to support my busy neesan’s hectic life even a little, I kept offering help whenever I could, but it was like preaching to the choir. ]])

    MSG([[ Without a single complaint, neesan managed her endless daily tasks all on her own. ]])


    -- //BU：マリカ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0011.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
“Fufu, coming to this park always calms me down. Doesn’t it feel like we’ve gone back to the old days?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0084.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
“That’s right. We used to play here all the time together.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ One day, neesan invited me to come to the park where we used to play together. ]])

    MSG([[ Thanks to taking a route where we wouldn’t be seen, we were alone outside for the first time in a long time. ]])

    MSG([[ Feeling like I’d returned to the past, a smile naturally spread across my face. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0085.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
“Are you okay physically? I... sometimes worry. You always take on whatever’s asked of you—helping clubs, tutoring, anything—” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0086.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
“Ah! I believe in you, neesan, of course! Really!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0012.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
“Hahaha! No need to get so flustered. I know very well that Mina-chan trusts me.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0013.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
“I’ve been able to work hard so far because Mina-chan believes in me. I want to be someone more reliable, bigger, a role model for you.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0014.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
“But because of that, I have to leave home and go to Yuriai Private Academy. I need to leave your side and grow even more—absolutely.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0087.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
“Eh?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ —Neesan is going to Yuriai Private Academy? I’d never heard such a thing before. ]])

    MSG([[ I had heard about Yuriai Private Academy from neesan. It’s reputed as one of the top prestigious girls’ schools in the country. ]])

    MSG([[ But it’s quite far from our home, so commuting would be difficult. ]])

    MSG([[ Why would neesan go to such a school? Seeing my confused expression, Marika-neesan gently patted my head like she used to and pointed at the sky. ]])

    MSG([[ Where she pointed, I could faintly see the moon. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0015.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
“Mina-chan, remember this: The moon was originally part of the Earth. It separated with a great impact and now it shines large and splendid.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0016.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
“That is the Giant Impact! A mystery of adversity turning into strength! We siblings realized we need the same meteor-level impact!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0088.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
“N-Neesan…?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Neesan had drifted into her own world. At this point, no one else’s words would reach her. ]])

    MSG([[ Once Marika-neesan sets her sights on the path to take, she never wavers no matter what anyone says. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
“I will become the best ‘princess’ at Yuriai Private Academy! And as the strongest big sister, I’ll come back to you, Mina-chan!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0018.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
“So wait for me until then! After all... I’m going to be the first female prime minister in this country!” ]])

    MSG([[ As always, Marika-neesan’s ideas were so grand that an immature person like me couldn’t fully understand them. ]])

    MSG([[ Still, I somehow understood that she had made a serious decision and was going to leave me. ]])

    MSG([[ And that decision also made me come to my own resolve. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0019.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
“Phew... Sorry for the strange talk. I just wanted to properly tell you about going to Yuriai Private Academy.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0020.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
“Shall we head back? Starting in April, I’ll live in the dorm, so I need to prepare lots of things.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：モブ男性×３
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("mob_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Mob】
“H-Hey, is that... Marika-chan?!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mob_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
【Mob】
“It really is Marika-chan! The real deal!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mob_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
【Mob】
“Marika-chaaaaan! Shake my hand!” ]])

    MSG([[ A crowd gathered as they noticed Marika-neesan at the park. Usually calm, even Marika was caught off guard and paused. ]])

    MSG([[ Taking her hand, I started running. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0089.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
“Let’s run, neesan!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0021.wav")
    MSG([[
【Marika】
“Eh, y-yeah!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)

    MSG([[ We ran at full speed to shake off our pursuers. Running beside neesan, I quietly made a vow inside. ]])

    -- //BG：黒バック
--    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
--    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //SE：バイブ音
    PLAY_SE("SEb007.wav",0)

    MSG([[ From now on, whenever Marika-neesan is in trouble, I’ll be the one who can take her hand like this. ]])

    MSG([[ I’ll become strong and brave—a real man’s man—who can keep up with Marika-neesan’s growth. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- //BG：黒バック
--    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
--    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //SE：バイブ音
    --PLAY_SE("SEb007.wav")
    PLAY_SE("SEb007.wav", 0, true)
    --WAIT(1000)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    MSG([[ I felt a tremor and was startled, thinking it was an earthquake. ]])

    MSG([[ ...I heard a sound. ]])

    MSG([[ Huh...? I was with neesan at the park... No, that can’t be. ]])

    MSG([[ I think I had a nostalgic dream, but the content was vague. My head felt fuzzy and I couldn’t think clearly. ]])

    -- //BG：病室（朝）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000)

    MSG([[ Gradually blood returned to my brain, and my familiar hospital room came into view. I must have fallen asleep sitting in a chair. ]])

    MSG([[ —Thank goodness it wasn’t an earthquake, I was truly relieved. ]])

    MSG([[ Last night, the Yuriai Private Academy uniform arrived, so I came to show it to Marika-neesan. Since she looked unwell, I got special permission to stay overnight in the hospital room and watched over her all night. ]])

    MSG([[ Still, falling asleep without realizing it... I’d been visiting every day, so maybe the fatigue caught up with me. ]])

    MSG([[ I have to be careful... ]])

--PLAY_SE("SEb007.wav")
--WAIT(1000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0090.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
“Fuwaa... huh? There’s some noise coming from my pocket...” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Only now did I notice my phone vibrating in my pocket. I took it out and saw it was a call from my cousin Akira. ]])

    MSG([[ The clock read 7 a.m. What could she want to call at this hour? ]])


    -- //BG：病院の廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG010aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I moved to a place where I wouldn’t disturb others and called Akira back. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEb007.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0091.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
“Hello, this is Minato. What’s up calling so early?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
“Morning morning. Well, it’s not really important.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
“Today’s the entrance ceremony for Yuriai Private Academy. You’ve been pretty busy lately, so I thought I’d remind you just in case.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
“Oh, it’s not a rebound, okay? Not a classic diet fail or a key basketball skill either.” ]])

    MSG([[ ...Entrance ceremony? Hearing Akira’s words, my brain stopped working. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
“...Mina-chin? What’s wrong? I’m hoping for you to tease me like usual or else I’m in trouble.” ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM04.wav",0)

    -- //CI：006
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI006a")
--LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
--LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
--LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
--LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",1000,false)
LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0092.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
“I, I, I forgotーーーーー!!?!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
“Whoa... your voice is too loud...” ]])

SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",0,false)
--LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,1000,Ease.Linear)
--LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
--WAIT(1000)
--LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-200,500,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
“Sorry, Akira! Gotta go! Talk later!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
“W-wait――” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)

    MSG([[ I hung up, quickly brushed my teeth and washed my face at the hospital sink, then wiped my body down with a wet towel. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0093.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
“...I don’t smell, right? I showered last night before coming back.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ —I was aware I’d been focused on neesan recently... but I never thought I’d forget the entrance ceremony. ]])

    MSG([[ Come to think of it, I barely read the entrance guide and only just barely managed to buy the uniform... ]])
    　
    MSG([[ Ashamed of how I lose myself when it comes to Marika-neesan, I quickly changed into my uniform and left the hospital. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP01_07")

end
